summary: A sword similar to the swords used by the Roman legionaires.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4][u]ROMAN GLADIUS[/u][/size][/center][size=3][i]This mod has been included in my larger mod "Armory of the Legion" found [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61099/?]here[/url]. I recommend using "Armory of the Legion" instead of this mod because it contains all my work so far.The re-placer version of this mod can still be used in combination with Armory of the Legion.[/i]
[/size]
[u][b][size=4]About:[/size][/b][/u]
This mod adds a sword similar to the ones used by the Roman legionaires. The sword is short and more suitable for stabbing than slashing. 

The mod comes in two versions:

Standard: Adds a sword named "Gladius" under "Steel" in the crafting menu. Specs are the same as the vanilla imperial sword.
Replacer: Replaces the vanilla imperial sword model with the Gladius model. Specs are the same as the vanilla imperial sword.

Have a look at my other mods for more Roman gear
Enjoy
author: RenderLegion
